import axios from 'axios' import { i_camera, i_contact, i_document, i_emoticon, i_image, i_location, i_plus, i_profileMenu } from "../../../../images"; import React,{useState} from 'react' const Message = (props) =>{ const [user, setUser] = useState([]) React.useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:5024/api/v1/contacts/1?id_friend=${props.friend}`).then((res) => { setUser(res.data.data) }).catch((err) => { console.log(err.message) }) },[props.id_contact]) console.log(user) return(
{user.map((element)=>(
{element.name}
Online
))}
Image
Document
Contact
Location
) } export default Message
